Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Noncommittal \Non`com*mit"tal\, n. A state of not being committed or pledged; forbearance or refusal to commit one's self. Also used adjectively. [1913 Webster]
noncommittal adj : very reluctant to give out information [syn: {guarded}, {unrevealing}]
